item.title: Non-nullable references with C# 8 and DotnetCore 3.0
item.description: How to use Non-nullable references The era before C# 8 Code Title CS0458 The result of the expression is always ‘null’ CS0464 Comparing with null of struct type always produces ‘false’ CS0472 The result of the expression is always the same since a value of this type is never equal to ‘null’ CS1720 Expression will always cause a System.
